name: GroupingColumn

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the field or bucket field that is used for column grouping.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name of the field that is used for column grouping.

methods.name: getDataType
methods.description: Returns the data type of the field that is used for column grouping.

methods.name: getGroupingLevel
methods.description: Returns the level of grouping for the column.

description: Contains methods for describing fields that are used for column grouping.
